@davidi2 wrote:

Wrote this quickly:

[code=java]import java.awt.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.util.*;
import javax.swing.JFrame;

public class ChristmasFrame extends JFrame implements MouseMotionListener {

private static final long serialVersionUID = -473544466078929337L;
final int MAX_SNOWFLAKES = 100;
final int WIDTH = 500;
final int HEIGHT = 500;
Image buffer = null;
Graphics2D bufferGraphics = null;
ArrayList<Snowflake> snow = new ArrayList<Snowflake>();
Rectangle platform = new Rectangle(0, 0, 50, 20);

public static void main(String[] args) {
	new ChristmasFrame();
}

ChristmasFrame() {
	initialize();
}

private void initialize() {
	setTitle("Merry Christmas, MoparScape!");
	setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
	setSize(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
	setResizable(false);
	setLocation(100, 100);
	addMouseMotionListener(this);
	setVisible(true);
	createSnowflakes();
	createBufferImage();
	new Thread(new AnimationThread(this)).start();
}

public void createSnowflakes() {
	for(int i = 0; i < MAX_SNOWFLAKES; i++) {
		snow.add(new Snowflake());
	}
}

public void updateSnow() {
	for(Snowflake s : snow) {
		s.move();
	}
}

public void createBufferImage() {
	try {
		if(buffer != null) {
			bufferGraphics = (Graphics2D)buffer.getGraphics();
		} else {
			buffer = createImage(WIDTH, HEIGHT);
			bufferGraphics = (Graphics2D)buffer.getGraphics();
		}
	} catch(Exception e) {
		System.out.println("Error getting buffer graphics.");
		e.printStackTrace();
		return;
	}
	bufferGraphics.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING, RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON);
	bufferGraphics.setPaint(new GradientPaint(new Point(0, 0), Color.gray.darker(), new Point(0, WIDTH), Color.blue));
	bufferGraphics.fillRect(0, 0, WIDTH, HEIGHT);
	bufferGraphics.setPaint(Color.green);
	bufferGraphics.fillRect(platform.x, platform.y, platform.width, platform.height);
	bufferGraphics.setPaint(Color.white);
	bufferGraphics.setFont(new Font("SansSerif", Font.ITALIC, 38));
	bufferGraphics.drawString("Merry Christmas!", 20, HEIGHT-80);
	for(Snowflake s : snow) {
		s.draw(bufferGraphics);
	}
}

public void paint(Graphics g)
{
	if(buffer != null) {
		g.drawImage(buffer, 0, 0, null);
	}

}

@Override
public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e) {}

@Override
public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e) {
	platform.setBounds(e.getX()-25, e.getY(), 50, 5);
}

private class Snowflake  {

	private int x, y, diameter, speed;
	Random rand = new Random();

	public Snowflake() {
		createSnowflake();
	}

	public void createSnowflake() {
		y = 0;
		x = rand.nextInt(WIDTH);
		diameter = 2 + rand.nextInt(5);
		speed = diameter; //Try to keep some simple physics, heavier objects fall faster
	}

	public void move() {
		if(!new Rectangle(x, y, diameter, diameter).intersects(platform)) {
			y += speed;
			if(y > HEIGHT) {
				createSnowflake();
			}
		} else {
			y = platform.y-diameter+1;
		}

	}

	public void draw(Graphics2D g) {
		g.setPaint(Color.white);
		g.fillOval(x, y, diameter, diameter);
	}
}

private class AnimationThread implements Runnable {

	long delayDifference = 0L;
	long normalPeriod = ((long) 1000.0/50) * 1000000L; //50 FPS
	ChristmasFrame parent = null;

	public AnimationThread(ChristmasFrame p) {
		this.parent = p;
	}

	public void run() {
		long startTime, endTime, timeDif, timeToSleep;
		startTime = System.nanoTime();
		while(true) {
			parent.updateSnow();
			parent.createBufferImage(); 
			parent.repaint();      
			endTime = System.nanoTime();
			timeDif = endTime - startTime;
			timeToSleep = normalPeriod - timeDif - delayDifference;
			if(timeToSleep > 0) {
				try {
					Thread.sleep(timeToSleep/1000000L);
				} catch(Exception e) {}
				delayDifference = System.nanoTime() - endTime - timeToSleep;
			}
			startTime = System.nanoTime();
		} 
	}

}

}[/code]
Pretty simple. Snow falls. You can catch snow with your platform (obviously mouse controlled) and release it back, or w/e

package com.ollisoft;

import java.awt.BasicStroke;

/**

  • Merry Christmas, MoparScape!

    public class MerryChristmas extends Frame {

    public MerryChristmas() {
    setTitle(“Merry Christmas!”);
    setSize(640, 480);

         @Override

    g2d.setPaint(new GradientPaint(new Point(0, 0), Color.cyan, new Point(0, getHeight()), Color.green));
    g2d.fillRect(0, 0, getWidth(), getHeight());
    }

    public void drawTitle(Graphics2D g2d, String s) {
    g2d.setPaint(Color.blue);
    g2d.setFont(new Font(“Comic Sans MS”, Font.PLAIN, 38));
    g2d.drawString(s, 20, 70);
    }

    public void drawTree(Graphics2D g2d) {
    Polygon tree = new Polygon();
    tree.addPoint(192, 479);
    tree.addPoint(154, 479);
    tree.addPoint(154, 377);
    tree.addPoint(54, 377);
    tree.addPoint(154, 286);
    tree.addPoint(98, 286);
    tree.addPoint(154, 238);
    tree.addPoint(128, 238);
    tree.addPoint(173, 188);
    tree.addPoint(218, 238);
    tree.addPoint(192, 238);
    tree.addPoint(244, 286);
    tree.addPoint(192, 286);
    tree.addPoint(290, 377);
    tree.addPoint(192, 377);
    tree.addPoint(192, 479);
    g2d.setPaint(new Color(0, 128, 64));
    g2d.fillPolygon(tree);
    g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
    g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
    g2d.drawPolygon(tree);
    g2d.setPaint(Color.red);
    g2d.fillOval(90, 366, 30, 30);
    g2d.fillOval(212, 356, 30, 30);
    g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
    g2d.drawOval(90, 366, 30, 30);
    g2d.drawOval(212, 356, 30, 30);

    g2d.fillOval(91, 273, 30, 30);

    g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
    g2d.drawOval(91, 273, 30, 30);

    public void drawSnowman(Graphics2D g2d) {

    g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));

    g2d.setPaint(Color.white);
    g2d.fillOval(390, 300, 120, 100);

    g2d.drawOval(390, 300, 120, 100);

    g2d.setPaint(Color.orange);
    g2d.fillOval(430, 273, 26, 20);
    g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
    g2d.drawOval(430, 273, 26, 20);
    g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
    g2d.setPaint(new Color(128, 64, 0));
    g2d.drawLine(497, 330, 539, 271);
    g2d.drawLine(539, 271, 545, 243);
    g2d.drawLine(539, 271, 572, 262);
    g2d.drawLine(402, 330, 346, 276);
    g2d.drawLine(346, 276, 348, 253);
    g2d.drawLine(346, 276, 322, 272);
    g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(1)); // Reset
    }

    public void drawBox(Graphics2D g2d, String s, int x, int y) {
    g2d.setFont(new Font(“Arial”, Font.PLAIN, 12));
    int boxWidth = g2d.getFontMetrics().stringWidth(s) + 10;
    int boxHeight = g2d.getFontMetrics().getHeight() + 8;
    g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
    g2d.fillRect(x, y, boxWidth, boxHeight); // The Box
    g2d.setPaint(Color.white);
    g2d.drawRect(x, y, boxWidth, boxHeight); // The Border
    g2d.drawString(s, x + 5, y + g2d.getFontMetrics().getHeight() + 2); // Wierd Offset
    }

    @Override
    public void paint(Graphics g) {
    Graphics2D g2d = (Graphics2D) g;
    g2d.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING, RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON);
    drawBackground(g2d); // Gradient
    drawTitle(g2d, “Merry Christmas MoparScape!”); // Title
    drawTree(g2d); // Christmas Tree
    drawSnowman(g2d); // Snowman
    drawBox(g2d, “Made by Ollie123”, 25, 440); // Name

    }

    public MerryChristmas() {
        setTitle("Merry Christmas!");
        setSize(640, 480);
        setResizable(false);
        addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter() {

            @Override
            public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) {
                System.exit(0);
            }
        });
    }

    public void drawBackground(Graphics2D g2d) {
        g2d.setPaint(new GradientPaint(new Point(0, 0), Color.cyan, new Point(0, getHeight()), Color.green));
        g2d.fillRect(0, 0, getWidth(), getHeight());
    }

    public void drawTitle(Graphics2D g2d, String s) {
        g2d.setPaint(Color.blue);
        g2d.setFont(new Font("Comic Sans MS", Font.PLAIN, 38));
        g2d.drawString(s, 20, 70);
    }

    public void drawTree(Graphics2D g2d) {
        Polygon tree = new Polygon();
        tree.addPoint(192, 479);
        tree.addPoint(154, 479);
        tree.addPoint(154, 377);
        tree.addPoint(54, 377);
        tree.addPoint(154, 286);
        tree.addPoint(98, 286);
        tree.addPoint(154, 238);
        tree.addPoint(128, 238);
        tree.addPoint(173, 188);
        tree.addPoint(218, 238);
        tree.addPoint(192, 238);
        tree.addPoint(244, 286);
        tree.addPoint(192, 286);
        tree.addPoint(290, 377);
        tree.addPoint(192, 377);
        tree.addPoint(192, 479);
        g2d.setPaint(new Color(0, 128, 64));
        g2d.fillPolygon(tree);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.drawPolygon(tree);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.red);
        g2d.fillOval(90, 366, 30, 30);
        g2d.fillOval(212, 356, 30, 30);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.drawOval(90, 366, 30, 30);
        g2d.drawOval(212, 356, 30, 30);
        g2d.setPaint(new Color(255, 126, 0));
        g2d.fillOval(91, 273, 30, 30);
        g2d.fillOval(228, 270, 30, 30);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.drawOval(91, 273, 30, 30);
        g2d.drawOval(228, 270, 30, 30);
        g2d.setPaint(new Color(128, 0, 255));
        g2d.fillOval(105, 217, 30, 30);
        g2d.fillOval(210, 224, 30, 30);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.drawOval(105, 217, 30, 30);
        g2d.drawOval(210, 224, 30, 30);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(1)); // Reset
    }

    public void drawSnowman(Graphics2D g2d) {
        g2d.setPaint(Color.white);
        g2d.fillOval(360, 360, 180, 130);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
        g2d.drawOval(360, 360, 180, 130);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.white);
        g2d.fillOval(390, 300, 120, 100);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
        g2d.drawOval(390, 300, 120, 100);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.white);
        g2d.fillOval(410, 240, 80, 80);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_BUTT, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
        g2d.drawOval(410, 240, 80, 80);
        g2d.fillOval(431, 258, 10, 10);
        g2d.fillOval(459, 268, 10, 10);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.orange);
        g2d.fillOval(430, 273, 26, 20);
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.drawOval(430, 273, 26, 20);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(3, BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND, BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND));
        g2d.setPaint(new Color(128, 64, 0));
        g2d.drawLine(497, 330, 539, 271);
        g2d.drawLine(539, 271, 545, 243);
        g2d.drawLine(539, 271, 572, 262);
        g2d.drawLine(402, 330, 346, 276);
        g2d.drawLine(346, 276, 348, 253);
        g2d.drawLine(346, 276, 322, 272);
        g2d.setStroke(new BasicStroke(1)); // Reset
    }

    public void drawBox(Graphics2D g2d, String s, int x, int y) {
        g2d.setFont(new Font("Arial", Font.PLAIN, 12));
        int boxWidth = g2d.getFontMetrics().stringWidth(s) + 10;
        int boxHeight = g2d.getFontMetrics().getHeight() + 8;
        g2d.setPaint(Color.black);
        g2d.fillRect(x, y, boxWidth, boxHeight); // The Box
        g2d.setPaint(Color.white);
        g2d.drawRect(x, y, boxWidth, boxHeight); // The Border
        g2d.drawString(s, x + 5, y + g2d.getFontMetrics().getHeight() + 2); // Wierd Offset
    }

    @Override
    public void paint(Graphics g) {
        Graphics2D g2d = (Graphics2D) g;
        g2d.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING, RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON);
        drawBackground(g2d); // Gradient
        drawTitle(g2d, "Merry Christmas MoparScape!"); // Title
        drawTree(g2d); // Christmas Tree
        drawSnowman(g2d); // Snowman
        drawBox(g2d, "Made by Ollie123", 25, 440); // Name
        g2d.dispose();
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        new MerryChristmas().setVisible(true);
    }
}
